name: The All Seeing Orb
description:
Two levels - Find your way to the possessed house then navigate your way through the pocket dimensions within to defeat the evil and release the neighbourhood from the curse.

Very much unfinished but hopefully you can see the idea behind it.

Mac and Linux builds are untested. Two versions for Windows, Debug and no debug. Try the no debug version first.

!!!Game seems to run in browser but download will likely run much better!!!

Minor update to fix level transition not working. (And again because the first fix didn't take)

Minor update to fix geometry bug on 2nd level. Game should now be complete-able.
